english.segment1: Come back don't leave keep stalling. Come back to me I'm falling. In love
english.segment2: But the last thing you said to me. Made it seem like those just won't last. Time and time again. Breaking all our plans from the past
english.segment3: You'll find out. Hear me now. There's someone better out there
english.segment4: You made me laugh. I mad eyou cry. It's time we said our last goodbye
